sentences.en: A special dispensation may be obtained from the domestic union concerned.
sentences.cn: 从国内相关的工会那儿或许能得到一项特许。

sentences.en: Alone dispensation, it is a not easy thing.
sentences.cn: 单独配药, 是一件不轻易的事情.

sentences.en: By a special dispensation from the Church, he was allowed to re - marry.
sentences.cn: 他得到了教会的特许而再婚.

sentences.en: By a special dispensation from the Church, she was allowed to remarry.
sentences.cn: 凭教会给予的特许状, 她获准再婚.

sentences.en: By dispensation from the Church, she was allowed to remarry.
sentences.cn: “凭”教会给予的特许状, 她获准再婚.

sentences.en: He directed the dispensation of food to the refugees.
sentences.cn: 他指挥分发食物给难民.

sentences.en: Hence, a stewardship is a dispensation.
sentences.cn: 因此, 管家职分就是一种分赐.

sentences.en: She can only marry her cousin with a special dispensation.
sentences.cn: 她需要得到特准才能嫁给她的表亲.

sentences.en: She needed a special dispensation to remarry.
sentences.cn: 她需要得到特许才能再婚。

sentences.en: The New Testament is the dispensation indwelling God in the heart of His people.
sentences.cn: 新约乃是神内住在他子民心里的时代.

sentences.en: The New Testament is the dispensation of the indwelling God in the heart of His people.
sentences.cn: 新约乃是神内住在祂子民心里的时代.

sentences.en: They were promised dispensation from military service.
sentences.cn: 他们得到许诺，可以免服兵役。

sentences.en: Thus, God's dispensation is first a matter of His household economy, or family economy.
sentences.cn: 因此, 神的经纶首先是祂的家庭经营的事.

sentences.en: Total dispensation of cigarettes can be difficult for a habitual smoker.
sentences.cn: 吸惯烟的人要做到完全不吸烟不是一件容易的事.

words.tran_cn: 可分配；可特别恕免；可宽恕
药剂师；施与者；分配者；自动售货机

trans.tran_en: A dispensation is special permission to do something that is normally not allowed
